ai-tha-ap283:1.1_0: I was sitting on the bank of the riverbank
ai-tha-ap283:2.1_0: The world’s Elder is hard to find.
ai-tha-ap283:2.3_0: I’ve got all to give to you,
ai-tha-ap283:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap283:3.4_0: I drew the fruits in reed.
ai-tha-ap283:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap283:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap283:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap283:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcālacaṇḍa.
ai-tha-ap283:6.1_0: with the first part of the senior monks.
